<section>
  <h2>About This Project</h2>

  <p>
    This website was created by <strong>Maxime Fleury</strong>, a member of the 
    <em>Biostatistics and Methodology Unit (UBM) at the Institut Paoli-Calmettes</em>.<br>
    <strong>Contact:</strong> <a href="mailto:fleurym@ipc.unicancer.fr">fleurym@ipc.unicancer.fr</a>
  </p>

  <p>
    This project was initiated as part of an applied research effort in <strong>biostatistics</strong>,
    focusing on <strong>sample size calculation methods in clinical trials</strong>,
    with a particular emphasis on <strong>simulation approaches</strong>, including
    <strong>Monte Carlo simulations</strong>.
  </p>
  </h2>
</section>

This project is in develpment phase to explore an educational way to introduce sample size by simulation.

Secondary objectives was to create templates for git project and create website with [**Quarto**](https://quarto.org/) for the UBM team.
